name: Ali Abdullah Saleh
primeminister: Haidar Abu Bakr al-Attas, Muhammad Said al-Attar, Abdul Aziz Abdul Ghani, Faraj Said Bin Ghanem, Abdul Karim al-Iryani, Abdul Qadir Bajamal, Ali Muhammad Mujawar
